page.title: 20Features & Bibliography
page.content: Historic Features The stocks in Penkridge are situated by the Public Library off the Cannock Road.They have been locked up to stop them being vandalised.They have been left,as they were from the past century,not being altered or demolished,like some of the surrounding buildings.Behind the stocks you can find a building,with bars across the windows,where the people were locked up.One building which hasn't been knocked down is the White Hart public house and hotel with its white washed walls and distinctive black beams. Bibliography: David Pearce,Richard Warburton,Clare Kenderdine,Richard Watson,Jonathan Kitchen,Philip Bowler, Diane Crump,Claire Wetton,Karen Perry, Helen Phillips,Emma Stowe,Karen Wright, Janice Till,Martyn Byrne,Andrew Guest, Ian Breeze,Glyn Kay & Gwynneth Ellis.
